1.name: Mete Atamel
1.title: Developer Advocate
1.shortBio: I'm a Developer Advocate at Google, currently focused on helping developers with Google Cloud Platform.
1.bio: I'm a Developer Advocate at Google, currently focused on helping developers with Google Cloud Platform. As a long-time Java and a recent C# developer, I like to compare the two ecosystems. Prior to Google, I worked at Microsoft, Skype, Adobe, EMC, and Nokia building apps and services on various web, mobile and cloud platforms. Originally from Cyprus, I currently live in Greenwich, not too far away from the prime meridian.

2.name: David Vávra
2.title: CEO
2.shortBio: David is a Google Developer Expert for Android. He is a CEO now, but he still finds time for diving deep into Android architecture.
2.bio: David is a Google Developer Expert for Android. He is a CEO now, but he still finds time for diving deep into Android architecture. He currently focuses on Firebase for Android. He loves open-source and gadgets like Android Wear or Android TV. He is the core organiser of GDG Prague events.

3.name: Sofiya Huts
3.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
3.shortBio: Sofia is a manager of GDG Lviv (http://lviv.gdg.org.ua/) and also leads local WTM (Women Techmakers https://www.womentechmakers.com/) community in Lviv.
3.bio: Sofia is a manager of GDG Lviv (http://lviv.gdg.org.ua/) and also leads local WTM (Women Techmakers https://www.womentechmakers.com/) community in Lviv. Additionally, one of organisers of GDG DevFest Ukraine (https://devfest.gdg.org.ua/). Despite that fact that Sofia has been working as Full-stack .Net developer during last 2 years, she is really passionate about front-end stuff, especially everything related to Progressive Web Apps and developing fancy web application using Polymer.

4.name: Honza Slavík
4.title: Jedi Knight
4.shortBio: Honza is professional Jedi Knight. His work is care about balance of power at galaxy and czech companies. Do not try to understand me. You could go crazy over it. ;)
4.bio: Honza is professional Jedi Knight. His work is care about balance of power at galaxy and czech companies. Do not try to understand me. You could go crazy over it. ;)

5.name: Resul Caner Yıldırım
5.shortBio: Caner is a GDE on UX/UI who is also a technology geek. Mainly focused on the design and marketing of mobile applications.
5.bio: Caner is a GDE on UX/UI who is also a technology geek. Mainly focused on the design and marketing of mobile applications. Passionate about good UX, IoT and Android. He works at InnovationBox, a design agency in Istanbul making and creating apps that users love. Caner has been an organiser of GDG Istanbul since 2013, organising, participating, and speaking at events.

6.name: Petr Ferschmann
6.shortBio: Co-founded and operated cloud based accounting system ABRA @FlexiBee. Loves backend and so he is involved in @fnxio. Now he's starting a new project.
6.bio: Co-founded and operated cloud based accounting system ABRA @FlexiBee. Loves backend and so he is involved in @fnxio. Now he's starting a new project.

7.name: Juraj Oceliak
7.shortBio: Android Teamleader at eMan.cz where I work on variety of projects for large customers.
7.bio: Android Teamleader at eMan.cz where I work on variety of projects for large customers.

8.name: Martin Čacký
8.shortBio: Martin is a design leader. He strives to create environments where great design can take place.
8.bio: Martin is a design leader. He strives to create environments where great design can take place.

9.name: Oleh Zasadnyy
9.shortBio: Oleh is a front-end developer who is passionate by new technologies and design.
9.bio: Oleh is a front-end developer who is passionate by new technologies and design. He also is a GDG Lviv organizer last 5 years, which is famous for their high-level organized conferences. Besides that, he participates in GDG design competitions and always in the top three. Oleh has created several front-end Open Source projects. The most popular are event website templates, one of them you are looking at.

10.name: Silvana Wasitova
10.shortBio: Silvana Wasitova CSP and PMP, started her Scrum journey as part of the Agile transformation at Yahoo!, and used Scrum to successfully deliver FIFA Worldcup 2006 and Olympics 2008 portals.
10.bio: Silvana Wasitova CSP and PMP, started her Scrum journey as part of the Agile transformation at Yahoo!, and used Scrum to successfully deliver FIFA Worldcup 2006 and Olympics 2008 portals. Silvana has coached multinational enterprises in their Agile transformation journeys in United States and across Europe. Silvana lives and breathes the agile value of “People over Process”, and brings that to the forefront in her coaching approaches, while still focused on the client’s audacious goals and desired results. Her experiences include implementing and coaching scrum transformation in Yahoo, Nestle, Roche, Skype, Microsoft, Aviva and a private Swiss bank.

11.name: Tomáš Zvěřina
11.shortBio: Full stack developer, Google Developer Expert for Cloud Platform, Dart enthusiast, father of kids and OSS libraries.
11.bio: Full stack developer, Google Developer Expert for Cloud Platform, Dart enthusiast, father of kids and OSS libraries.

13.name: Světlana Margetová
13.shortBio: iOS developer with orientation on the best UI/UX during developing and preparing mobile app.
13.bio: iOS developer with orientation on the best UI/UX during developing and preparing mobile app. I am data analyst now, but I can effectively connect data information with mobile use cases with focus on IoT systems, sensors and other smaller devices. Skills: Swift, Firebase, UI/UX
